# RV-16 Basic D Flip-Flop: Store switch_0(5) when switch_1(6)=1
# Initialize: RAM[16]=0 (latch)
0000000000000000 0000000000010000 0000000000000000 0000000000000011 # Pass 0 -> RAM[16]
# Latch: r16 = switch_0 when switch_1=1
0000000000000001 0000000000010000 0000000000000101 0000000000000110 # NAND switch_0(5), switch_1(6) -> RAM[16]
# Store and output
0000000000000011 0000000001100100 0000000000010000 0000000000000000 # STORE r16 -> RAM[100]
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0000000001100100 0000000000000011 # Pass RAM[100] to tape
